item.title: Is circumcision abuse?
item.description:
Written: Adrian Liberto

Video: Ariana Yekrangi

  • If you are in a position to help, please consider supporting The Gordian Magazine with a Patreon subscription
  • Read the article published on the website

item.title: Ayesha Kajee Talks to UN-aligned About Her Poem "Silence"
item.description:
In September 2021, UN-aligned arranged a poetry competition and asked writers to creatively portray the values that its Manifesto campaigns for. The second place was awarded to Ayesha Kajee for her poem Silence. The following interview was conducted on the 2nd of November 2021.

Watch the interview here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o33ltCPX_6I

Read Ayesha’s poem “Silence"

item.title: Author Dean Gessie Talks to UN-aligned about his “Terra Australis Incognita”
item.description:
In September 2021, UN-aligned arranged a poetry competition and asked writers to creatively portray the values that its Manifesto campaigns for. The first place was awarded to Dean Gessie for his poem “Terra Australis Incognita”. The following interview was conducted on the 31st of October 2021.

Read Dean’s poem “Terra Australis Incognita”.

Watch our interview with Dean Gessie here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B39EuPH21Ng
